dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but seriously, have you ever booked a flight, and you get to the end, and the price is just… not what you started with?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but seriously, have you ever booked a flight, and you get to the end, and the price is just... not what you started with?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, every single time! Like, what is up with that? It’s so frustrating.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, every single time! Like, what is up with that? It's so frustrating.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Because, um, guess what? The Agency for Protection and Development of Competition – the APDC – they've actually caught FlyArystan doing this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Because, um, guess what? The Agency for Protection and Development of Competition - the A P D C - they've actually caught FlyArystan doing this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Agency for Protection and Development of Competition (APDC) has identified signs of abuse of dominant market position by the airline FlyArystan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, really? Oh my god, like, finally! Someone's looking into it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, really? Oh my god, like, finally! Someone's looking into it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they found these hidden surcharges, you know, automatically added, uh, at various stages of booking. Like, it's not even optional sometimes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they found these hidden surcharges, you know, automatically added, uh, at various stages of booking. Like, it's not even optional sometimes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An APDC analysis found that ticket prices were increased through hidden surcharges that were automatically added at various stages of booking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! They call it "drip pricing," don’t they? Where they just... drip, drip, drip-add things on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! They call it drip pricing, don't they? Where they just... drip, drip, drip-add things on?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This practice, known as drip pricing, is completely banned under European law.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's the term. And apparently, Marat Omarov, the agency chairman, he said it's completely banned under European law.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's the term. And apparently, Marat Omarov, the agency chairman, he said it's completely banned under European law.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This practice, known as drip pricing, is completely banned under European law. ... said agency chairman Marat Omarov during a board meeting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so then it should be banned here! That's, um, that's just not right. It’s misleading.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so then it should be banned here! That's, um, that's just not right. It's misleading.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And good news is, the APDC identified these violations, they issued a notice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And good news is, the A P D C identified these violations, they issued a notice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We identified these violations and issued a notice to the airline to cease breaching antitrust regulations, which was subsequently complied with,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And FlyArystan actually, like, complied? So they stopped?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And FlyArystan actually, like, complied? So they stopped?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, apparently they did comply. Which is, you know, a win, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, apparently they did comply. Which is, you know, a win, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...issued a notice to the airline to cease breaching antitrust regulations, which was subsequently complied with,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A small win! But it makes you wonder about the bigger picture, right? Like, if FlyArystan was doing it…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A small win! But it makes you wonder about the bigger picture, right? Like, if FlyArystan was doing it...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Because now the APDC is actually doing a full antitrust review of the entire domestic air travel market.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Because now the A P D C is actually doing a full antitrust review of the entire domestic air travel market.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, the APDC is conducting an antitrust review of the domestic air travel market.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that’s huge! I mean, after that Air Astana compensation thing, too, it feels like airlines are really under the microscope now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge! I mean, after that Air Astana compensation thing, too, it feels like airlines are really under the microscope now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Read also: Air Astana ordered to compensate father and daughter for ruined holiday

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It's about time, honestly. For far too long, it's just been, um, accepted practice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It's about time, honestly. For far too long, it's just been, um, accepted practice.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like, enough is enough with those sneaky fees. Seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like, enough is enough with those sneaky fees. Seriously.
